actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To establish a temporary program of supplemental unemployment benefits for unemployed coal miners who have exhausted their rights to regular unemployment benefits.
short_title: Coal Miners' Unemployment Assistance Act of 1989

summary.text: Coal Miners' Unemployment Assistance Act of 1989 - Directs the Secretary of Labor to establish a temporary program of supplemental unemployment benefits for unemployed coal miners who have exhausted their rights to regular unemployment benefits. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Coal Miners' Unemployment Assistance Act of 1989
To establish a temporary program of supplemental unemployment benefits for unemployed coal miners who have exhausted their rights to regular unemployment benefits.
